about_the_game:
Defend the grandeur of the Roman Empire against relentless Barbarian hordes in this immersive tower defense game. Assume the role of a Roman commander tasked with safeguarding the empire's borders from waves of invading enemies.

As the protector of Rome, strategically position your defenses along the frontier, erect mighty fortifications, and deploy disciplined Roman soldiers. Plan your defensive layout with precision, exploiting the strengths of each unit to repel the Barbarian onslaught.

Upgrade your defenses, enhance your troops' abilities, and research new technologies to stay one step ahead of the Barbarians. Unlock specialized Roman units to unleash devastating counterattacks.

Witness the spectacle of intense battles as the Barbarians relentlessly assault your fortifications. Marvel at the clash of steel and the thunderous roar of catapults as you command your troops to hold the line and protect the heart of the empire. Coordinate defensive strategies, adapt to enemy tactics, and make strategic decisions that will determine the fate of Rome.

Immerse yourself in a variety of historically inspired locations, from the misty forests of Germania to the sun-drenched deserts of Gaul. Confront legendary Barbarian warlords, and overcome their unique challenges to ensure the survival of the empire.

Experience the thrill of defending Rome in a tower defense game that combines strategic planning, resource management, and thrilling combat. Can you stand firm against the relentless Barbarian hordes and safeguard the glory of the Roman Empire? Prepare your defenses, rally your troops, and embark on an unforgettable battle to preserve the empire's legacy.


Gameplay:

Roman Empire vs. Barbarians is a base defense game that challenges you to destroy the enemy’s base.

Barbarians keep expanding all over the place and you’ve been summoned as the hero who’s going to stop them. You’re provided with a Roman Empire tower that comes with a powerful catapult and a team of warriors. Will that be enough to stop the barbarian invasion?

You can easily tell that the game is pretty straightforward in the beginning. But as you progress further, it can be challenging.

Features:
- Pay for an army of warriors to protect your lands from the invading barbarian hordes
- Collect coins and increase the capacity of your treasury
- End the threat by destroying the enemy base
- Play through all 50 stages
- Survival mode
